description: This file is a JavaScript module implementing an API client for the Recipe Hub frontend, including functions for making HTTP requests to fetch recipes, handle authentication, and manage API endpoints.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl
methods.description: Reads and returns the API base URL from environment variables, removing trailing slashes.

methods.name: apiRequest(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body = undefined, auth = true } = {})
methods.description: Performs a generic HTTP request with proper headers, token handling, and response parsing, handling 401 redirects.

methods.name: api.listRecipes
methods.description: Fetches a list of recipes with optional pagination and search.

methods.name: api.getRecipe
methods.description: Fetches a specific recipe by ID.

methods.name: api.createRecipe
methods.description: Creates a new recipe with the provided payload.

methods.name: api.updateRecipe
methods.description: Updates an existing recipe identified by ID with the provided payload.

methods.name: api.deleteRecipe
methods.description: Deletes a recipe identified by ID.

methods.name: api.login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password.

methods.name: api.register
methods.description: Registers a new user with name, email, and password.
